WELCOME.HELP: This tool will allow you to check your IRC ATM card balance for free.
WELCOME.NOTE_1: Note: the information are updated on business days only.
WELCOME.NOTE_2: Please check the updated status below for the most recent update.

INPUT.CARD_NO: Enter your last 5 digits from the card

RESULTS.NOTE_1: Note: European ATM Machines only give out EURO. The displayed amount is in USD $.
RESULTS.NOTE_2: A Bank exchange rate will be applied once you withdraw money from the ATM in Euro.
